JobTitle: Privacy & Data Policy Manager, Research Data Sharing
JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for a Privacy and Data Policy Manager to join the policy team responsible for privacy protective data sharing issues. The team's mission is to develop privacy-protective and innovative approaches to sharing data that help bring the world closer together and improve people's lives. In this role, you'll help shape the company's policy approach to data sharing with third party researchers and other stakeholders. You will work closely with product managers, lawyers, engineers, scientists and external partners to develop privacy-preserving data sets, technologies, and policies to enable third-party research about issues of significant public interest. In particular, you will support our Facebook Open Research and Transparency (FORT) and Data for Good teams. Additionally, you will be the subject matter expert for policy on privacy protective data sharing methods and technologies.The ideal candidate for this role is a collaborative, self-motivated, problem solver who thrives in fast-paced environments and can juggle multiple projects simultaneously. This candidate should excel at both detailed work and high-level strategic thinking.
